name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in **programming**, **data structures**, and **algorithms**, essential for building high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise includes proficiency in **Java**, **AWS**, and **Kubernetes**, alongside a deep understanding of **distributed systems** and **microservices** architecture. 
I have successfully developed enterprise-grade platforms that leverage **big data** technologies and integrate **AI/ML** capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. With hands-on experience in designing **event-driven systems** and implementing **CI/CD automation**, I ensure the creation of robust, secure applications that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
Additionally, I am skilled in developing machine learning pipelines, serving ML models in production, and executing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My passion for continuous learning drives me to stay abreast of the latest technologies and techniques, enabling me to deliver innovative solutions.

Implemented mobile application development using **Flutter** and **React Native**, focusing on integrating native modules and state management, delivering a seamless user experience across **iOS** and **Android** platforms.

Contributed to software performance through rigorous implementation of **data structures** and **algorithms**, optimizing complex tasks and ensuring high-quality code throughout development cycles.

Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification combining **MLflow** and **Airflow**, allowing real-time decision-making and model inference directly integrated into back-end services, reducing processing times by **50%**.

Implemented advanced algorithms and data structures to improve backend processes, achieving a **30%** reduction in latency for critical transactions and transactions per second (TPS) metrics.
Designed and integrated machine learning models to enhance user experience through personalized recommendations, employing big data technologies to analyze and process vast datasets efficiently.
Utilized comprehensive communication protocols and secure APIs to ensure robust interaction between services, maintaining high standards of data integrity and compliance with regulations like GDPR.
Conducted rigorous performance testing and code reviews, ensuring adherence to industry best practices in software development and deployment lifecycle.
Facilitated cross-functional team collaboration, mentoring junior engineers in programming principles and effective use of distributed systems techniques, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement.
Managed cloud deployment processes, ensuring seamless integration of new features into production environments and reducing downtime during major updates by **40%**.
